
---
title: "GetPolicyDefintion"
title_tag: "Function GetPolicyDefintion | Module policy | Package Azure"
meta_desc: "Explore the GetPolicyDefintion function of the policy module, including examples, input properties, output properties, and supporting types. Use this data source to access information about a Policy Definition, both custom and built in. Retrieves Policy Definitions from your current subscription by default."
---



<!-- WARNING: this file was generated by Pulumi Docs Generator. -->
<!-- Do not edit by hand unless you're certain you know what you are doing! -->

Use this data source to access information about a Policy Definition, both custom and built in. Retrieves Policy Definitions from your current subscription by default.


{{% examples %}}
## Example Usage

{{< chooser language "typescript,python,go,csharp" / >}}

{{% example csharp %}}
```csharp
using Pulumi;
using Azure = Pulumi.Azure;

class MyStack : Stack
{
    public MyStack()
    {
        var example = Output.Create(Azure.Policy.GetPolicyDefintion.InvokeAsync(new Azure.Policy.GetPolicyDefintionArgs
        {
            DisplayName = "Allowed resource types",
        }));
        this.Id = example.Apply(example => example.Id);
    }

    [Output("id")]
    public Output<string> Id { get; set; }
}
```

{{% /example %}}

{{% example go %}}
```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-azure/sdk/v3/go/azure/policy"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v2/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		opt0 := "Allowed resource types"
		example, err := policy.GetPolicyDefintion(ctx, &policy.GetPolicyDefintionArgs{
			DisplayName: &opt0,
		}, nil)
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		ctx.Export("id", example.Id)
		return nil
	})
}
```

{{% /example %}}

{{% example python %}}
```python
import pulumi

example = azure.policy.get_policy_defintion(display_name="Allowed resource types")
pulumi.export("id", example.id)
```
